data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Dinamo Moscow push upfield but Stanislav Vasilev quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 3, Charles Kabore for Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at VTB Arena.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 8, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Important block from the Saint Petersburg defence as Charles Kabore fires in a strike for Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 11, Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sardar Azmoun is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In Moscow, Sebastian Driussi of Saint Petersburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 13, The match at VTB Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sebastian Driussi, who is down injured.
Sardar Azmoun returns to the field for Saint Petersburg after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 15, Saint Petersburgâ€™s Sebastian Driussi is on his feet again at VTB Arena.
Sebastian Driussi, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Andrey Mostovoy is the substitute for Saint Petersburg.
Dinamo Moscow needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
Can Saint Petersburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 17, Dinamo Moscow's Sebastian Szymanski gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a throw-in for Saint Petersburg, close to Dinamo Moscow's area.
In the minute 20, Wilmar Barrios (Saint Petersburg) strikes at VTB Arena but his header is cleared.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 23, Saint Petersburg drive upfield and Douglas Santos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dinamo Moscow defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Saint Petersburg in Moscow.
In the minute 24, Stanislav Vasilev awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dinamo Moscow's Sebastian Szymanski is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 25, Can Saint Petersburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dinamo Moscow's half?
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In Moscow Saint Petersburg attack through Yaroslav Rakitskiy. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
Saint Petersburg drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 33, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Artem Dzyuba for Saint Petersburg who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Artem Dzyuba is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 35, Dejan Lovren (Saint Petersburg) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 36, Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 39, Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Viacheslav Karavaev (Saint Petersburg) has received a yellow card from Stanislav Vasilev.
Goal! Toni Sunjic heads Dinamo Moscow into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 40, Great play from Sebastian Szymanski to set up the goal.
Stanislav Vasilev blows against Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba for offside.
Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 42, Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow advance rapidly upfield but Stanislav Vasilev blows for offside.
Dinamo Moscow needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
In the minute 45, Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Dinamo Moscow are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Douglas Santos for Saint Petersburg drives towards goal at VTB Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 48, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 49, Saint Petersburg's Wilmar Barrios has been booked in Moscow.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 50, Saint Petersburg's Douglas Santos breaks free at VTB Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg just outside Dinamo Moscow's area.
In the minute 52, Sebastian Szymanski for Dinamo Moscow has been booked by Stanislav Vasilev and receives a first yellow card.
Saint Petersburg's Malcom gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dinamo Moscow defender.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
In the minute 54, Stanislav Vasilev signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Dmitri Skopintsev of Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Throw-in high up the field for Saint Petersburg in Moscow.
At VTB Arena, Dinamo Moscow are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 58, Saint Petersburg are coming forward and Andrey Mostovoy gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Magomed Ozdoev of Saint Petersburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 64, Malcom (Saint Petersburg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Sylvester Igboun is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 65, Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
Dinamo Moscow's Sylvester Igboun looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 66, Sergey Parshivlyuk (Dinamo Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Nikolay Komlichenko (Dinamo Moscow) has replaced the possibly injured Sylvester Igboun at VTB Arena.
Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at VTB Arena.
In the minute 70, The away team have replaced Artem Dzyuba with Yuri Zhirkov. This is the second substitution made today by Sergey Semak.
Emiliano Rigoni is replacing Magomed Ozdoev for the away team.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at VTB Arena.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Dmitri Skopintsev (Dinamo Moscow) has been sent off!
Zaurbek Pliev is replacing Sebastian Szymanski for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
In the minute 76, Kirill Novikov (Dinamo Moscow) is making a third substitution, with Nikola Moro replacing Maximilian Philipp.
Saint Petersburg are pushing forward but Douglas Santos's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 78, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 79, At VTB Arena, Nikola Moro has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
In the minute 81, Saint Petersburg push forward at VTB Arena and Yaroslav Rakitskiy gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dinamo Moscow defence.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Free kick Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 83, Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Wilmar Barrios in Saint Petersburg has been yellow-carded a second time by Stanislav Vasilev and is being sent off.
In the minute 84, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Zaurbek Pliev.
Zaurbek Pliev has recovered and rejoins the match in Moscow.
Zaurbek Pliev is booked for the home team.
In the minute 86, Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
Roman Evgeniev (Dinamo Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Sergey Semak is making the team's fourth substitution at VTB Arena with Aleksey Sutormin replacing Yaroslav Rakitskiy.
In the minute 87, The away team replace Viacheslav Karavaev with Aleksandr Yerokhin.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Free kick in a good position for Saint Petersburg!
At VTB Arena, Charles Kabore has been yellow-carded for the home team.
7 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Douglas Santos (Saint Petersburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Saint Petersburg drives forward and Malcom gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Important block from the Dinamo Moscow defence as Emiliano Rigoni fires in a strike for Saint Petersburg.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In Moscow, Dinamo Moscow push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a throw-in for Saint Petersburg, close to Dinamo Moscow's area.
In Moscow, Aleksandr Yerokhin (Saint Petersburg) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
Saint Petersburg's Emiliano Rigoni has been booked in Moscow.
Anton Shunin is booked for the home team.
Dinamo Moscow make their fourth substitution with Grigori Morozov replacing Daniil Fomin.
